content.question: Directions: You will hear a brief conversation between two speakers. The exchange will be spoken twice. You are to select, from the four choices, the reply that the first speaker would be most likely to make to the remark of the second speaker.

choices.label: Ah, non, tu veux déjà quitter cette jolie petite plage déserte?
Bon d’accord, mais désormais, on ne viendra qu’en semaine.
Comme tu veux, mais demain, samedi, on ira au cinéma.
Tu as raison, l’après-midi ne fait que commencer.

content.answer: Bon d’accord, mais désormais, on ne viendra qu’en semaine.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe the literal meaning of the text.
